original_text: Therefore shall they eat of the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their own devices.
korean_text: 그러므로 자기 행위의 열매를 먹으며 자기 꾀에 배부르리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore shall they eat of the fruit of their own way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 자기 길의 열매를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and be filled with their own devices
